en.value: Emma
Stephen
The tickets for that [k]gig[/k] are really expensive! Do you think you'll go?
I don't mind.
I know you changed channel when I left!
Maria
I can't find the remote control so I'm unable to change the channel!
Really? Tell me all about it.
Actually, yes, they gave an amazing [k]performance[/k] and the other groups that supported them were really good.
Describe the last concert you went to.
performance
documentary
I've had a look at the [k]TV guide[/k] and there's a new police drama on after the news.
David
weather forecast
This is my favourite episode!
Reactions
[k]You're kidding me![/k] [k]I'm so pleased![/k] Your first baby - you must be so excited! I should have guessed, you are glowing!
The wildlife documentary is on after the news.
sold out
That's funny, because I don't feel very well! I have morning sickness!
episode
I can't believe you watch this TV series.
David, I've got some big news to share with you.
remote control
Do you think we should check the TV guide?
Select the words in the correct order.
concert hall
I'm so disappointed.
I actually saw them at a festival last year. Also, their shows this year haven't had particularly good [k]reviews[/k], so I think I'll leave it this time. Thanks though.
The tickets sold out within a week.
My favourite group has to be the Rolling Stones.
[k]I don't mind[/k], as long as it's healthy!
backing singers
I'm sure it will be, you'll make a great mother!
Watching TV
I really couldn't care less.
advert
lead singer
I think it's on channel 3, pass me the [k]remote control[/k] and I'll check...
Let's watch this instead. There's nothing else on.
I know, they cost a lot more than I expected. But I got a work bonus last month so I'll get one next week.
You poor thing!
TV guide
Paula
It can't be, that's impossible!
channel
What [k]channel[/k] is it on?
audience

I was waiting to see if a friend from work wants to come. Do you want to come as well?
The backing singers went on to form their own group.
Listen to the dialogue and fill in the gaps.
Live music
[k]You poor thing![/k] So, what are you hoping for - a girl or a boy?
Do you watch TV?
The Glastonbury music festival takes place in summer.
[k]Really? Tell me all about it![/k] Did something happen while I was off work?
You should come with us then! It's a great venue, I'm sure you'll love the [k]atmosphere[/k]!
music festival
The audience went wild when the group started to play.
It doesn't matter.
You had better hurry though. The rest of the tour dates are [k]sold out[/k].
They are going to shoot an advert.
James
There was a great gig in the pub last night.
I went to an open air rock concert 2 months ago, which completely sold out! It was amazing. The lead singer was so animated, and the musicians were extremely talented.
That's fantastic, I'm so pleased!
I didn't realise you'd seen them already. Didn't you enjoy it?
gig
group
The lead singer was exceptional.
Memorise the word(s) and listen to the example.
They've notified viewers that they're going to interrupt the broadcast.
Wow, what a fantastic performance!
I've seen on the weather forecast that it's going to rain tomorrow.
We need a big concert hall for this group.
TV series
Reacting to what we see in the media
You must have got the wrong day. They're showing a quiz show.
broadcast
This [k]documentary[/k] is so boring! I might go and read my book instead!
No! I'm pregnant! I've known for a while but Mark insisted that I wait for a few months until revealing the news.
